welcome: Welcome to Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock.
game_rules: Rem{name}, scissors cuts paper, paper covers rock, rock crushes lizard, lizard poisons Spock, Spock smashes scissors, scissors decapitates lizard, lizard eats paper, paper disproves Spock, Spock vaporizes rock, and as it always has, rock crushes scissors.
match_rules: First one to three wins takes the match!
win:
You chose {choice}, {name} chose {computer_choice}
You won! {name} is considering renaming herself to Spark
lose:
You chose {choice}, {name} chose {computer_choice}
Aww, you lost! {name} thinks it's time she became Flame
tie:
You chose {choice}, {name} chose {computer_choice}
It's a tie! {name} wants to play again!
user_match_winner: You won the match! {name} is now, begrudgingly, Spark
computer_match_winner: Aw, you lost! {name}'s changed her name to Flame!
replay: Do you want to play {name} again? Enter 'y' or 'n'!
